"Capture: Tames Trials":
"These are Trials in which you must guide as many Tames to their destination as possible within the time limit.

At the end of the Trial, you will receive rewards based on how many Tames you successfully guided. In addition, Rare Tames will be counted separately, and you will earn additional rewards for guiding them."

"Tames tend to run away from players, and a red trail will appear on Tames that are running away from you.

Try to get ahead of fleeing Tames and direct them towards their destination."
